question: Halak-kasar, shaving of full head.
answer:
QUESTION
I know to come out of Ihram HALAK / KASAR is must. I want to know why. Is it because Prophet (Sallalahu-Alaihi-Wasallam) has done it .or is there any sharai significance. Jazak-Allah.
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallalahu-Alaihi-Wasallam) shaved his hair when he performed haj. (Mishkaat, pg 232 Thanvi) Rasulullah make du'a three times for those shaved their hair and made du'a once for those who trimmed their hair (ibid).

And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
